Customer Support & Sales Representative

Professional and human qualities in an equally high degree distinguish each of our employees. Thus we create a team that is unrivaled in Ukraine.

Now we are looking for people with a good level of English (written literate), communication skills, with a desire to learn and develop in the field of IT.

At the position of Customer Support & Sales Representative you will need to chat with customers from the US and Europe, answer letters, sometimes solve customers’ problems over the phone, place orders, increasing total sales, attract new customers.

What we offer:
  • flexible schedule
  • comfortable working conditions at the comfortable office in Lvov
  • free education and continuous improvement of English language
  • Another couple of words about us

Friendly team, average age – 25 years. We adore working, making it professionally, improving ourselves and our team. Moreover, we know how to relax: hiking, hookah, fun corporate events – it’s all about us.

If you’ve got strong desire to succeed, if you are targeted on the result rather than the process, our company – this is the place where you should be.

To send us your CV click on “call for the vacancy”.
